author: rogerrut
msg: Enhanced perl portlet so that perl/cgi script can invoke other perl scripts (as long as they are included in the PA). Because the requests are initiated by the portlet the query string can be used to pass the parameters. If another portlet passes a request to the perl portlet it has to pass it as a part of the session.
